input.sentences: we were so excite for our college graduation .
professor phallange is showing me my degree .
we all lined up ready to go in .
professor duseldorf gave the commencement speech .
output.sentences: It is hard work to get through college but it is made easier when you have friends to help you on your journey.
Commencement Day has finally arrived and the Valedictorian checks the program order with the grand marshal.
Finally, with lumps in throats the graduates march in to their seats.
The Chancellor introduces the keynote speaker.
As the ceremony draws to a close, the new graduates stand for the granting of their degrees
